itemDisplayName: Deploy custom VMs with Singularity installed
description: This template allows the deployment of a custom Linux VM with Singularity installed, using, by default, Ubuntu 16.04 and Singularity 2.4, in a A8 size VM in the resource group location specified and returns the FQDN of the VM.
summary: This template allows the deployment of a custom Linux VM with Singularity installed.
